when someone is not allowed to take part in something or enter a place
the country’s exclusion from the United Nations
when a child is officially made to leave their school because of their bad behaviour
something that is excluded from a contract
You will be sent full details of the exclusions of your insurance policy.
a particular event or risk that is mentioned in an insurance policy as something that the policy does not cover
Common exclusions in medical insurance policies are pregnancy, cosmetic surgery and treatment of AIDS.
an amount that would normally form part of a person’s or company’s total income, but on which tax does not have to be paid
Customs are reviewing the current range of exclusions.
